description: Try our easy to follow Gluten Free Cardamom And Pistachio No Churn Ice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Gluten Free Cardamom And Pistachio No Churn Ice Cream
name: Gluten Free Cardamom And Pistachio No Churn Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: The next day, cut ice cream mixture into small pieces, transfer to a food processor and whiz until smooth. Pour into a 1L capacity loaf pan, scattering with some of the sugar-frosted pistachios as you go, and freeze for 2 hours or until firm. Serve scooped with remaining sugar-frosted pistachios. Note: While every care has been taken to ensure this recipe is gluten-free, always check labels as ingredients differ from brand to brand.
